summary: Prince Hamlet struggles over whether or not he should kill his uncle, whom he suspects has murdered his father, the former king.
cast: John Laurie|Esmond Knight|Anthony Quayle|Niall MacGinnis|Harcourt Williams|Patrick Troughton|Tony Tarver|Peter Cushing|Stanley Holloway|Russell Thorndike|Basil Sydney|Eileen Herlie|Laurence Olivier|Norman Wooland|Felix Aylmer|Terence Morgan|Jean Simmons|Anthony Bushell|Patricia Davidson|John Gielgud|Doreen Lawrence|Christopher Lee|Desmond Llewelyn|Victor Lucas|Patrick Macnee
title: Hamlet
